title: Retrieve Self-Employment Annual Summary
description: Retrieves a self-employment annual summary for a tax year.

periodId.description: Concatenated Period Start and End dates.

periodStartDate.description: The first day that the income, expenses and deduction period summary covers. Must conform to the format: YYYY-MM-DD

periodEndDate.description: The last day that the income, expenses and deduction period summary covers. Must conform to the format: YYYY-MM-DD

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint.

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.
